products.title: Al Fresco Ember Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Al fresco ember roman blind in grey/brown/multicoloured. Made to measure from 17.59 with free uk mainland delivery. This roman blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Showing a forest in full bloom. Choose from a softer grey-toned palette to a golden-red to bring nature in to your home.
 
 Product id: db-rom0912 fabric colour: ember material: 100% cotton lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.   Control type: smooth chain operation - great for a durable, even finish energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes

products.title: Fresco Teal
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure fresco teal deluxe roman blinds from soeasy blinds. Order quality deluxe roman blinds online today at low prices with fast uk delivery
products.productdescription:
Min width: 350mm max width: 1340mm (with join 2500mm)
 	min drop: 400mm max drop: 2500mm
 	fabric composition: 100% cotton
 	guarantee: 12 months
 	controls: sidewinder control.
 	Fabric lining: fully lined as standard, blackout and interlining available.
 	Fixings: fixing brackets included.
 	Headrail: robust aluminium headrail, 40mm wide x 40mm deep.
 	Finish: fabric attached to headrail with velcro.
